snippet.title: Build a Rhythm Game in Ren'Py!
snippet.description:
GitHub: https://github.com/RuolinZheng08/renpy-rhythm  
itch.io: https://r3dhummingbird.itch.io/renpy-rhythm-game

This is a demo of a rhythm game engine I built for the Ren'Py Visual Novel Game Development engine. You will never have to manually specify a beat map for your custom song - This engine is capable of automatically generating beat maps using onset detection for any custom audio file. This engine is entirely free and open-source.   

The music files are for demonstration purposes only and I have no right over them.  Those included with the source code are all copyright-free music found on SoundCloud, credited appropriately.

The three tracks used in this demo are from the following video games:
- Die Anywhere Else from Night in the Woods
- Stardust Diving from OMORI
- Your Reality from Doki Doki Literature Club


#renpy #visualnovel #gamedev #opensource #sourcecode
